topic.title: 주말 소풍 계획하기
topic.description: 날씨 좋은 주말에 친구와 함께 소풍 계획을 세우는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 네, 맞아요. 우리 뭔가 특별한 걸 해보는 게 어때요?
좋은 생각이에요. 우리 소풍 가는 거 어때요?
서울숲 공원은 어때요? 거기 가본 적 있어요?
아니요, 없어요. 거기서 뭘 할 수 있는데요?
자전거도 탈 수 있고, 맛있는 샌드위치를 먹을 수도 있어요.
그럼 제가 샌드위치를 만들게요. 토요일에 만나요!

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: The weather is supposed to be really nice this weekend.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: The weather is supposed to be really nice | this weekend.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yeah, I know. Why don't we do something special?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yeah, | I know. || Why don't we do something special?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: That's a great idea. How about we go on a picnic?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: That's a great idea. || How about we go on a picnic?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Sounds perfect! Where should we go?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Sounds perfect! || Where should we go?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How about Seoul Forest Park? Have you ever been there?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How about Seoul Forest Park? || Have you ever been there?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: No, I haven't. What can we do there?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: No, | I haven't. || What can we do there?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: We can ride bikes and eat delicious sandwiches.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: We can ride bikes | and eat delicious sandwiches.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay! I'll bring some snacks and drinks.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay! || I'll bring some snacks and drinks.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Then I'll make the sandwiches. See you on Saturday!
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Then I'll make the sandwiches. || See you on Saturday!
